trends: There have been 9 other sightings in North Babylon
There were 2 other sightings in North Babylon on or around June 18th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw the object appear close to the same spot it did last night except it flew directly over my house and vanished over it. I recorded it on my video camera once again. There are some very odd things going on in the skies over long island at night. 4th event I was able to capture in 4 nights this has been happening for 3 weeks now.
